doc.title: Kashmir: Under the Shadow of the Gun
doc.plot: The title, "Under the Shadow of the Gun" accurately describes life in Indian-administered Kashmir today. With an estimated 700,000 soldiers in the state, it remains a cauldron of civil and political unrest. This film recounts the history of the conflict as seen through the eyes of individuals who have been involved with the human rights abuses, that have recurred repeatedly since 1987.
